service_details.subtitle: Whether you're scaling cloud-native infrastructure or starting your security transformation, we help you build a resilient and compliant DevSecOps framework.

sections.title: DevSecOps Assessment
sections.description: Gain a 360° view of your current security posture. Our experts perform detailed audits across applications, CI/CD pipelines, and infrastructure to identify risks and define actionable improvements.
offerings: Comprehensive stack-wide assessment covering nodes, workloads, and infrastructure layers.
Experience securing both bare-metal and managed Kubernetes platforms (EKS, GKE, AKS, etc.).
Actionable insights to strengthen your DevSecOps maturity and compliance posture.

sections.title: Consulting & Advisory
sections.description: We design and implement security strategies tailored to your infrastructure, helping you integrate DevSecOps best practices from the ground up.
offerings: Identify gaps in your DevOps processes and integrate security automation seamlessly.
Develop a roadmap to advance your security maturity and toolchain efficiency.
Our consultants have successfully guided 50+ enterprises across diverse industries.

sections.title: Security Tool Deployment
sections.description: Get the right security stack in place. We help you select, configure, and integrate tools that strengthen your pipelines and prevent vulnerabilities before production.
offerings: Evaluate, recommend, and implement the best-fit DevSecOps tools for your needs.
Seamless integration of security scanners, policy engines, and monitoring tools.
Embed security checks directly into your CI/CD workflow for early risk detection.

sections.title: Compliance & Audit Readiness
sections.description: Stay audit-ready with frameworks built around leading global standards. We help automate compliance monitoring and reporting to simplify governance.
offerings: Fast-track compliance with DevSecOps and cloud-native best practices.
Continuous compliance monitoring with alerting and audit traceability.
Achieve and maintain GDPR, HIPAA, PCI DSS, and other key certifications.

sections.title: Managed DevSecOps Services
sections.description: Leave the complexity of day-to-day security operations to us. We manage, monitor, and optimize your DevSecOps ecosystem 24/7.
offerings: End-to-end management of your DevSecOps tools, infrastructure, and processes.
Let AppsCode’s experts handle threat prevention, mitigation, and incident response.
Focus on innovation while we ensure your environments stay secure and compliant.

sections.title: Enablement & Training
sections.description: Empower your teams to adopt and operate DevSecOps independently through guided training and documentation.
offerings: Build internal security competency with knowledge transfer and best practice guides.
Implement self-service monitoring and incident response solutions.
Train your engineers to embed DevSecOps principles into their daily workflows.
